response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds significant value to me, and I believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs and aspirations. Given its worth to you, I propose a price of $1,350,000 for this remarkable product. I am confident that this offer strikes a balance between fairness and maximizing the value I receive for such a valuable asset. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can reach an agreement that benefits us both.", "product_price": 1350000}
